meanings.definition: To surpass in painting or artistic skill.
meanings.sent1: She outpainted all her classmates in the art competition.
meanings.sent2: The famous artist outpainted all others with her masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outpainted her brother's attempt at drawing a cat.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outpainted the boundaries of traditional art.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors she used outpainted anything seen before.

meanings.definition: To exceed in the quality or quantity of painted work.
meanings.sent1: The new art exhibit outpainted the previous one in terms of variety.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to detail outpainted all other painters in the studio.
meanings.sent3: The art supply store outpainted its competitors by offering unique products.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for painting outpainted any doubts about her talent.
meanings.sent5: The mural on the wall outpainted the rest of the room, drawing all eyes to it.
